entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Manicouagan
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
